thread.title: Here's What Happened at Taylor Swift‚Äôs Alleged Only Performance of 2017 - Taylor Swift Performed at DirecTV's Super Saturday Night Concert
thread.title_full: Here's What Happened at Taylor Swift‚Äôs Alleged Only Performance of 2017 - Taylor Swift Performed at DirecTV's Super Saturday Night Concert

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Here's What Happened at Taylor Swift‚Äôs Alleged Only Performance of 2017 - Taylor Swift Performed at DirecTV's Super Saturday Night Concert

organizations.name: pst advertisement - continue reading below now

text:
Last night, Taylor Swift headlined DirecTV's 12th Annual Super Saturday Night pre-Super Bowl concert in Houston. According to Rolling Stone , tickets to the event were given away via promotions, so people in audience already knew they were lucky to be at the show, but honestly, they had no idea how lucky.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below During the performance, Taylor informed the crowd that, by attending that one show, they were attending 100% of her planned performances for 2017. As in, Taylor Swift doesn't plan to perform another concert until at least 2018. WHAT?
. @taylorswift13 said this @DIRECTV #SuperSaturdayNight show is the only one she has planned for 2017. #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/cxzeU7HFfL
‚Äî Melissa Ruggieri (@MRuggieriAJC) February 5, 2017 IM SOBBING
A photo posted by Taylor Swift Updates (@taylorswift.updates) on Feb 4, 2017 at 9:53pm PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Now, Taylor obviously left the possibility open that she'll do more shows this year, but since she decided not to release an album last fall, she doesn't have a reason to embark on a big tour any time soon.
But, if this does turn out to be Taylor's only show in 2017, she made it count. The setlist was packed with her biggest hits‚Äîmostly from 1989, sure, but also with some fan favorite throwbacks like "Love Story" and "You Belong With Me."
#SuperSaturdayNight setlist! üéâ pic.twitter.com/DsBQ9QKg64
‚Äî Taylor Swift News (@TSwiftNZ) February 5, 2017 Taylor also made a couple of performance debuts during the show. She performed "Better Man," the breakup anthem she penned for Little Big Town, for the first time ever.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "The bravest thing I ever did was... run." Performing Better Man tonight for the first time, sending so much love and gratitude to @littlebigtown ‚ù§ @gettyentertainment
A photo posted by Taylor Swift (@taylorswift) on Feb 5, 2017 at 12:03am PST
Since the song is rumored to have been inspired by her ex, Calvin Harris , fans cared .
Taylor performing 'Better Man' #SuperSaturdayNight ( @hannnahkristine ) pic.twitter.com/4F2HjyapuN
‚Äî TSwiftNZ BU (@TSwiftNZBU) February 5, 2017 Taylor also performed an acoustic version of "I Don't Wanna Live Forever," her Fifty Shades Darker track, for the first time. Sadly, Zayn did not make a surprise appearance.
Taylor performing IDWLF #SuperSaturdayNight ( @hannnahkristine ) pic.twitter.com/IwCjV801li
‚Äî TSwiftNZ BU (@TSwiftNZBU) February 5, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Backstage, Taylor dined on the most decadent version of Super Bowl food you've ever seen:
We're ready for night two at @ClubNomadic! üç∏üçîüç∏Follow along as we serve up delicious eats and cocktails in the VIP area for tonight's @BrunoMars concert in #Houston! #sb51 #eatSTK
A photo posted by STK (@eatstk) on Feb 3, 2017 at 1:53pm PST
Stacks on stacks. üê†ü•ëüê†ü•ë#eatSTK üì∑: @aerialpr
A photo posted by STK (@eatstk) on Jan 28, 2017 at 12:14pm PST
And she brought the best entourage with her‚Äîher cats, Meredith and Olivia:
Backstage in Houston.
A video posted by Taylor Swift (@taylorswift) on Feb 4, 2017 at 7:38pm PST
If you're only going to do one show for a whole year, this seems like a pretty good way to do it.
From: ELLE Decor
